interestingcomments.content: Pirating/Sideloading Playmemories Apps on Sony Cameras Possible? /!/ I have an RX100M4. Is it at all possible to sideload or somehow download(free) the playmemories apps on to the camera. It is a neat concept but the apps are too expensive. :(
